ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64
xz:
- '5'

about.description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with a high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but also
work on some not-so-POSIX systems.
about.summary: Data compression software with high compression ratio
a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
A set of tools to work with xz-/lzma-compressed files
A set of tools to work with xz-/lzma-compressed files (forked of grep)

a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib

name: xz-split

about.description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with a high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but also
work on some not-so-POSIX systems.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "5.8.2" %}

package:
  name: xz-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/tukaani-project/xz/releases/download/v{{ version }}/xz-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ce09c50a5962786b83e5da389c90dd2c15ecd0980a258dd01f70f9e7ce58a8f1

build:
  number: 0
  run_exports:
    # XZ's track record of backcompat is very good.  Keep default pins (next major version)
    #    https://abi-laboratory.pro/tracker/timeline/xz/
    - {{ pin_subpackage('xz') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - cmake-no-system  # [win]
    - ninja  # [win]
    - make  # [not win]
    - diffutils  # [not win]

outputs:
  - name: liblzma
    build:
      run_exports:
        # XZ's track record of backcompat is very good.  Keep default pins (next major version)
        #    https://abi-laboratory.pro/tracker/timeline/xz/
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma') }}
    script: install-liblzma.sh  # [unix]
    script: install-liblzma.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      run_constrained:
        # Ensure this collides with the unsplitted version
        - xz {{ version }}.*
    test:
      commands:
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\liblzma.dll exit 1  # [win]
        - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\lzma.lib exit 1         # [win]
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.a                     # [unix]
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma${SHLIB_EXT}           # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.so.*.*                  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.*.dylib                 # [osx]
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
      license: 0BSD
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
  - name: liblzma-devel
    build:
      run_exports:
        # XZ's track record of backcompat is very good.  Keep default pins (next major version)
        #    https://abi-laboratory.pro/tracker/timeline/xz/
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma') }}
    script: install.sh  # [unix]
    script: install.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\liblzma.dll exit 1  # [win]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\lzma.lib exit 1     # [win]
        - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\liblzma.lib exit 1      # [win]
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.a                     # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma${SHLIB_EXT}             # [unix]
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
      license: 0BSD
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
  - name: xz-tools
    script: install.sh  # [unix]
    script: install.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        # Ensure this collides with the unsplitted version
        - xz {{ version }}.*
    test:
      commands:
        - lzcat --help  # [unix]
        - lzma --help  # [unix]
        - lzmadec --help
        - lzmainfo --help
        - unlzma --help  # [unix]
        - unxz --help  # [unix]
        - xz --help
        - xzcat --help  # [unix]
        - xzdec --help
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: A set of tools to work with xz-/lzma-compressed files
      license: 0BSD AND LGPL-2.1-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
        - COPYING.LGPLv2.1
  - name: xz-gpl-tools
    script: install.sh  # [unix]
    script: install.bat  # [win]
    build:
      skip: true  # [win]
      run_exports:
        # XZ's track record of backcompat is very good.  Keep default pins (next major version)
        #    https://abi-laboratory.pro/tracker/timeline/xz/
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma') }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz-tools', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        # Ensure this collides with the unsplitted version
        - xz {{ version }}.*
    test:
      commands:
        - lzcmp --help
        - lzdiff --help
        - lzegrep --help
        - lzfgrep --help
        - lzgrep --help
        - lzless --help
        - lzmore --help
        - xzcmp --help
        - xzdiff --help
        - xzegrep --help
        - xzfgrep --help
        - xzgrep --help
        - xzless --help
        - xzmore --help
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: A set of tools to work with xz-/lzma-compressed files (forked of grep)
      license: 0BSD AND LGPL-2.1-or-later AND GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
        - COPYING.LGPLv2.1
        - COPYING.GPLv2
  - name: xz
    build:
      run_exports:
        # XZ's track record of backcompat is very good.  Keep default pins (next major version)
        #    https://abi-laboratory.pro/tracker/timeline/xz/
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma') }}
    script: install.sh  # [unix]
    script: install.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz-tools', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz-gpl-tools', exact=True) }}  # [unix]
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz-tools', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz-gpl-tools', exact=True) }}  # [unix]
    test:
      commands:
        - xz --help  # [not win]
        - unxz --help  # [not win]
        - lzma --help  # [not win]
        - xz.exe --help  # [win]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\liblzma.dll exit 1  # [win]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\lzma.lib exit 1  # [win]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\lzma.h exit 1  # [win]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
        - test ! -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.a          # [unix]
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: Data compression software with high compression ratio
      license: 0BSD AND LGPL-2.1-or-later AND GPL-2.0-or-later
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
        - COPYING.LGPLv2.1
        - COPYING.GPLv2
  - name: liblzma-static
    script: install.sh  # [unix]
    script: bld-static.bat  # [win]
    build:
      always_include_files:
        - Library/lib/cmake/liblzma  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        # Ensure this collides with the unsplitted version
        - xz {{ version }}.*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.a          # [unix]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\lzma-static.lib exit 1  # [win]
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
      license: 0BSD
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD
  - name: xz-static
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - cmake-no-system  # [win]
        - ninja  # [win]
        - make  # [not win]
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('xz', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-static', exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-devel', exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage('liblzma-static', exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/liblzma.a          # [unix]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\lzma-static.lib exit 1  # [win]
    about:
      home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
      dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/
      summary: a compression library with an API similar to that of zlib
      license: 0BSD
      license_file:
        - COPYING
        - COPYING.0BSD

about:
  home: http://tukaani.org/xz/
  license: 0BSD AND LGPL-2.1-or-later AND GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file:
    - COPYING
    - COPYING.0BSD
    - COPYING.LGPLv2.1
    - COPYING.GPLv2
  summary: Data compression software with high compression ratio
  description: |
    XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with a high
    compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but also
    work on some not-so-POSIX systems.
  doc_url: http://tukaani.org/xz/
  doc_source_url: https://github.com/xz-mirror/xz/blob/master/README
  dev_url: http://git.tukaani.org/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - msarahan
    - ocefpaf
    - mingwandroid
    - nehaljwani
    - scopatz
    - xhochy
